name: WorldCapitals
0:
”Alexa, open world capitals.”
”Alexa, ask world capitals to play the quiz.”
”Alexa, ask world capitals to teach me the capital of Mexico.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world capitals
des: You can take a 5 question quiz, or ask to learn specific country capitals.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
